column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////We will always happily add toppings directly to the ramen bowls if the customer makes the request. But by default
column2: we must serve toppings on the side. Also
column3: specific ramen bowls are served with seasoned eggs as listed on the menu. We're never going to please everyone with every dish
column5: just let your server know how you would like your bowl prepared and he or she will make sure to accommodate your preferences.
